StartPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm trying to decide whether I should take
the road <clr:0000>north<clr:ffff> and head toward
<clr:0000>New Serenne Stable<clr:ffff>...
Or if I should make my way to <clr:0000>Tabantha
Bridge Stable<clr:ffff> to the <clr:0000>west<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0800>Have you visited stables much? A lot of
travelers pass through them, so you're
bound to hear the latest news if you visit.
I know I can learn about <clr:0000>cherry-blossom
trees<clr:ffff> if I travel to stables. <sp:5:1:0>I might even
meet the voe of my dreams, if I'm lucky!
But first...I have to decide which stable
to visit.
GoalPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm thinking about how I'll meet the voe
of my dreams under the blooms of a
<clr:0000>cherry-blossom tree<clr:ffff>...
Which means I don't have time for voe
who are not of my dreams, OK?

<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hmm... Maybe I'll give an offering of fruit like that
voe did.

If the voe of my dreams came right as I was doing it,
he'd be impressed for sure!

Oh. What if a Satori came instead? I guess that
wouldn't be such a bad thing since I want to meet a
Satori too...
But if I had to choose, I'd pick the voe. No question.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:SurpriseS_01>Are you OK? It's really brave to face
powerful monsters...
SavedLv2_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Tired_00>Oof, that was exhausting.


I can't think of the last time I was that
scared. If you hadn't shown up when
you did...
GoalPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>That reminds me... Before, when you
<clr:0000>offered fruit<clr:ffff> at the <clr:0000>cherry-blossom tree<clr:ffff>...

There was this strange feeling in the air.
Like the whole atmosphere of the place
changed, somehow.
For a moment, I thought a <clr:0000>Satori<clr:ffff> had
actually come.

I do hope to one day meet a Satori, you
know. But more than that, I want to meet
the voe of my dreams...
Greeting_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Huh? Wait... You're that voe that was
under the cherry blossoms before!

I don't know if you remember me...


But I could never forget a voe that I saw
in such a romantic place!

<sp:3:0:2:0800>Is it possible that you're the voe I am
meant to be with?

...<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0000>Hm.<sp:5:1:0> No, I can see it in your face. You
aren't interested in me at all, are you?
Greeting_01:
That's OK. <sp:5:0:0>I am too busy to be interested
in anyone who doesn't share the feeling.

<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm on a mission to visit all <clr:0000>eight<clr:ffff> of the
<clr:0000>cherry-blossom trees<clr:ffff> that exist in
the world.
That way, when I meet the voe of
my dreams...

We'll meet in a really nice place! It's
important to start things off on the right
foot, after all.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>And... I might just meet a <clr:0000>Satori<clr:ffff> too, if
I'm really lucky.
Greeting_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Oh, it's you again. Well, nice to see you
and all that, but I'm only interested in
the voe of my dreams, OK?
Just making that clear. <sp:5:0:0>Anyway, do you
need something?
BackRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>There are rumors that suggest a <clr:0000>Satori<clr:ffff>
might live on a mountain near here.

Since I've come all this way anyway,
I hope I'm able to catch a glimpse of it...

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>I'm keeping my expectations low though.
If it were easy to find, there wouldn't just
be rumors, after all.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It apparently has an affinity for <clr:0000>cherry
blossoms<clr:ffff>. I bet it would show up if I
offered fruit beneath the tree.
I'd really like to meet such a creature...
Atacked01: <snd:SurpriseM>They won't let up! Help me out here!
StartPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Should I take the road north and head
for <clr:0000>New Serenne Stable<clr:ffff>...

Or should I make my way to <clr:0000>Tabantha
Bridge Stable<clr:ffff> to the <clr:0000>west<clr:ffff>?

<sp:3:0:2:0700>You know that stables are hubs for news
and information, right?

I'm going to visit one and find out all I can
about <clr:0000>cherry-blossom trees<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:1:0>I might even
meet the voe of my dreams, if I'm lucky!
But first...I have to decide which stable
to visit.
Guardian00: <sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Scare_01>There's no way I can win here!
SavedLv3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:SurpriseS_01>Wow! You're really strong!<sp:5:1:0> I wouldn't
have stood a chance in that fight...
Thanks00:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Happy_00>A small token of my appreciation! <sp:5:0:0>Here
you go!
SavedLv1_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Sad_00>Ow...


I was in real trouble there. I appreciate
you helping me out!
SavedLv1_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Ease_01>Phew, that was scary. <sp:5:0:0>Good thing you
were around!
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh! You are quite the handsome voe,
aren't you?
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Still, in a place as magical as this, I really
do believe I will finally meet the handsome
voe of my dreams.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>But until then, let me tell you a rumor I
heard about cherry-blossom trees.

Apparently there is a strange creature
called a Satori that is sometimes seen
near such trees.
I've never seen it myself, but I really
want to...

I also heard that a Satori likes fruit.<sp:5:0:0>
I guess I should have brought some
kind of fruit with me, huh?
GoRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Can't you see that I'm in a hurry? I need
to get to <clr:0000>Outskirt Stable<clr:ffff> as soon
as possible.
That's where a <clr:0000>map of the cherry-blossom
trees <clr:ffff>is located. I have to get there and
study it!
It is my destiny to meet the voe of my
dreams beneath a cherry-blossom tree,
after all.
But I can't make that happen unless I
know where the cherry-blossom trees are.
Does it all make sense now?
<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a00>Ugh... No matter how many times I look at that map,
I just can't commit all the locations to memory.
I really should take notes...<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Oh my, have you come to see the
cherry-blossom trees again?
RainPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Whenever it starts to rain, I'm reminded
of the time you <clr:0000>offered fruit<clr:ffff> at that
<clr:0000>cherry-blossom tree<clr:ffff>...
There was this strange feeling in the air.
Like the whole atmosphere of the place
changed, somehow.
Such an unusual sensation...


<sp:3:0:2:0700>We Gerudo never see the rain where
we're from, so it always feels special
when it happens on the road.
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Is there anything more relaxing than
watching cherry-blossom trees? It really
puts me at ease.
I haven't seen a Satori anywhere, but
these beautiful trees have made the trip
worth it all the same.
RainPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>It never rains in the Gerudo region, where
I'm from, so the rain here is always a
strange experience.
Everything looks completely different
during a downpour, don't you think?

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>That reminds me... Before, when you
<clr:0000>offered fruit<clr:ffff> at that <clr:0000>cherry-blossom tree<clr:ffff>...

there was this strange feeling in the air.
Like the whole atmosphere of the place
changed, somehow.
Such an unusual sensation...
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I've heard that a strange, fruit-loving
creature called a <clr:0000>Satori<clr:ffff> can be found near
cherry-blossom trees.
Apparently it is very rare to catch sight of
the creature though. <sp:5:1:0>I wonder if I could
do anything to coax it out of hiding?
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>That reminds me though.<sp:5:0:0> I thought I
heard some kind of animal cry earlier.

Maybe it was just my imagination? I'm not
sure now...
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>To meet in such a romantic place... <sp:5:0:0>Could
you be the voe I was destined to fall in
love with?
No, no, I can tell just from the look on
your face.

You did not come here in search for your
one true love. <sp:5:1:0>That's too bad.
BackRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>Thanks to the map at <clr:0000>Outskirt
Stable<clr:ffff>, I know <clr:0000>where to find the
cherry-blossom trees<clr:ffff>.
I'd better hurry while the locations are
still fresh in my mind!

See you! Sav'orq!
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS_00>It feels really good to relax like this once
in a while though. That's for sure!
BackRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Thanks to the map at <clr:0000>Outskirt
Stable<clr:ffff>, I know <clr:0000>where to find the
cherry-blossom trees<clr:ffff>.
I think it's time I started searching for the
voe of my dreams in earnest!

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Just imagining a destined meeting
between a voe and a vai, framed in
falling cherry blossoms...
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>Heheh, I get butterflies in my stomach
just thinking about it!

I'd better hurry while the locations of the
trees are still fresh in my mind.
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think>The snow isn't as bad here as it has been
lately, but...

Brrr... <sp:5:1:0>I'm still so cold.
Greeting:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>You're that voe that was under the cherry
blossoms before, aren't you?

I can't believe we'd run into each other
again after our first meeting was in such
a romantic place...
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Could it be...<sp:5:1:0> Are you the voe of my
dreams after all?!

...<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0000>No, I can see it in your face.


<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I don't hold that special place in
your heart.
BackRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>I've heard rumors that a mysterious
creature called a <clr:0000>Satori<clr:ffff> has been living
on a mountain near here for a long time.
I doubt it will show up if I'm storming
around and making a racket, so I'd better
move quietly...
<sp:3:0:2:0100>It apparently has an affinity for <clr:0000>cherry
blossoms<clr:ffff>. I bet it would show up if I
offered fruit beneath the tree.
I'd really like to meet such a creature.


<sp:3:0:2:0a00>And while I'd much rather meet the voe
of my dreams, seeing a Satori would be
amazing too.
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS_00>It might be a little bit chilly, but it still
feels really good to relax like this once
in a while.
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Oh, you're that traveler from the other
day.<sp:5:1:0> Did you come to see a cherry-
blossom tree?
